alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Coffey; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Anderson, Coffey and southeastern Lyon Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1115 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Beto Junction to 4 miles northwest of Gridley. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burlington, New Strawn, Gridley, Westphalia, Beto Junction, John Redmond Reservoir and Le Roy. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 153 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for east central Kansas.
